recipe.title: Stuffed zucchini with rice and mushroom
recipe.summary: Stuffed zucchini with rice and mushroom takes roughly 45 minutes from beginning to end. One serving contains 508 calories, 20g of protein, and 18g of fat. For $2.25 per serving, this recipe covers 31% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 4. Head to the store and pick up rice, salt, garlic, and a few other things to make it today. It works well as a main course. It is brought to you by spoonacular user jeremyzkc. Similar recipes are Stuffed zucchini with rice and mushroom, Mushroom Stuffed Zucchini With Parmesan Panko Topping, and Mushroom and Rice Stuffed Squash.
